field.name: summary
field.value: Scraper does not fetch Glassdoor urls

field.name: description
field.value:
When scraper tries to fetch contents of Glassdoor job listing url, it gets HTTP status 403 response
{code}java.io.IOException: Server returned HTTP response code: 403 for URL: http://www.glassdoor.com/Job/california-java-developer-jobs-SRCH_IL.0,10_IS2280_KO11,25_IP6.htm {code}

comment.author: rob
comment.text:
I have said this before: we have to have some kind of summary report that gets produced after a day of scraping and if a source has not produced a single lead in a few days, it should go into an alarm state.
Guys, like the stupid geo quota, we are writing code that just keeps repeating the same stupid things ad nauseum when we could write a tiny bit more code to KNOW that doing so is completely POINTLESS.

field.name: description
description
